  • Method Details

    • setEntities

      public static void setEntities​(java.util.List<Entity> newEntities)
      Refreshes the List of Entities inside the Handler
      Parameters:
      newEntities - List of all Entities

    • getEntities

      public static java.util.List<Entity> getEntities()
      Returns:
      returns List of all Entities

    • setPlayer

      public static void setPlayer​(Player playerChar)
      Player has to be set to check if Entity is Player or not
      Parameters:
      playerChar - sets Player

    • setMainPane

      public static void setMainPane​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane pane)
      Parameters:
      pane - sets the AnchorPane as mainPane to be drawn at

    • movement

      public static void movement​(Entity me, int dx, int dy)
      This method lets you move an Entity in a specific direction
      Parameters:
      me - entity to be moved
      dx - X direction to be moved (+1 is Right / -1 is Left) with full Speed
      dy - Y direction to be moved (+1 is Down / -1 is Up) with full Speed

    • movement

      public static void movement​(Entity me, Entity other)
      This method lets you move an Entity towards another Entity
      Parameters:
      me - Entity to be moved
      other - Entity to be moved towards at

    • drawWeapon

      public static void drawWeapon​(Entity me, int attackX, int attackY, int shownTime)
      This method gets the Weapon from the Entity class and attack in a specific direction depending on the 2 directional parameters
      Parameters:
      me - Reference Entity, from this Entity will be drawn
      attackX - X direction to be attacked at relatively to the Entity (+1 is Right / -1 is Left)
      attackY - Y direction to be attacked at relatively to the Entity (+1 is Down / -1 is Up)
      shownTime - Duration in Milliseconds for the Weapon to be shown

    • removeWeapon

      public static void removeWeapon​(Entity me)
      Removes the Weapon from the mainPane
      Parameters:
      me - Entity of the Weapon to be removed

    • attack

      public static void attack​(Entity me, Score score)
      Calculates Damage and score
      Parameters:
      me - Entity that attacks
      score - Score of the Game

    • sendData

      public static void sendData​(PlayerSprite playerSprite, Score score) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Sends PlayerSprite and Score to the Database
      Parameters:
      playerSprite - PlayerSprite used in Game
      score - Score at end of Game
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - throws SQLException if Connection fails
